price: যিদিনা আমি প্ৰবলভাৱে কৰায়ত্ত কৰিম, সেইদিনা আমি নিশ্চয় প্ৰতিশোধ লম।
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
